website_summaries.verdict: While many are happy with their results, there are mixed reviews about its effectiveness along with some quality concerns.
pros: Not only does this serum provide lash growth results for many users, it also helps nourish and grow eyebrows
Formula is hypoallergenic and not tested on animals
cons: Some complaints of the product being watery
A few reports of leaks/dried out product upon delivery
Some users griped that it takes longer than expected to work

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Rodan & Fields lash boost for about a year now. I just can't afford it. But with Lavish Lash, I am getting the same results for a fraction of the cost. I have tried a whole bunch of different ones and this is by far the most bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: A. Brouillette

customer_reviews.title: It's Actually Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I'll start right off the bat- yes, you do get a free bottle of this stuff if you give it a 5 star review. BUT, it actually does work. The pictures that people have posted on here aren't totally realistic, I didn't see that crazy change over 2 weeks or whatever, but I did notice that my lashes grew. While there wasn't a "wow!" change, I had a small section on my lash line that was totally lash-less, and I completely saw new lashes starting to grow there. Last thing: just know that you have to apply it daily. Lashes fall out, you can't apply it once and expect the results to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bickerstaffe

customer_reviews.title: They changed the formula.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my first tube in April or May 2018. It worked great, my lashes grew and I had no skin irritation. I just ordered another tube and noticed a burning sensation while the product dried. I checked the ingredient list and noticed that they have added ingredients to the formula. I have talked to a few of my friends that also use this product and they have noticed the burning and that their lashes are not as long. I will not be ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Henricks

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: I use to use Rodan & Fields product, but it was just too expensive. My daughter suggested this product as she is very happy with the results. Lashes are growing!
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: sensitive friendly, easy applying
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I have tried other lash serums which are irritating. I have sensitive eyes and this product seemed to accommodate well. I haven't noticed a huge difference from the first month, but maybe it's my eyes and it needs more time. Hopefully by next month I'll see a bigger difference. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Habiba

customer_reviews.title: Be patient with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I was discouraged at first since I don’t wear mascara on a normal basis and couldn’t really tell a difference. I got my hair done today and took a selfie and WOW...now I can see the length and volume growth! I’ve been using this product for about a month now and can’t wait to see my results after a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ward

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I turned 50 last year and have noticed a significant thinning of my eyelashes and eyebrows. No amount of mascara or brow filler worked, so I decided to try a lash growth product. I figured the more I spent, the better the product. I was wrong! After wasting money on pricier versions, the 5-star reviews and awesome price-point for Lavish Lash convinced me to give this a try. It really works! Within two weeks I noticed a difference and it just gets better. My lashes aren't "fake lash" long, but they look longer, fuller, and rock my favorite mascara again. Could not ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Fast thick growth!
customer_reviews.text: I usually have been using castor oil to keep my lashes healthy. But this stuff made my lashes grow so thick I basically have a thick layer growing and catching up with my regular lashes! Its so worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, really works !
customer_reviews.text: My wife writing this review: My mother in law got a very expensive eye lash growth serum that cost over 100$, but it was definitely doing the trick. I was on the hunt for a cheaper one with the same results. I turned to amazon and saw all the great reviews for this product so I had to give it a shot. This product is fantastic, I have been using this product for a month now and already notice a difference. Especially on my eyebrows whereI have so bare patchs. Love it. Would definitely recommend, 1/3 of the price compared to others and really works !
customer_reviews.author: John Procaccini

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several eyelash growth products, this is by far the best deal. Definitely will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Poe

customer_reviews.title: My thin eyebrows grew!
customer_reviews.text: I am thankful for this product. I did not use for eyelash growth, but for my thin eyebrows that were sparce. I used this EVERY day after showering and noticed my eyebrow hair growing out. Works as said!
customer_reviews.author: y.w

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews often but this product is amazing! Have been using it before bed for probably a little over a month. I got eyelash extensions all summer and they really did a number on my real ones. This serum helped so much. Attached pictures are proof!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Just started!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to try this product! Just got it today (love the 2 day shipping). Will post results!
customer_reviews.author: ohplease2

customer_reviews.title: Experienced growth within a month
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes were very short and I started to notice growth within a month. I’ve tried several products and this seems to be the only on that’s worked.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!!! Hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I’m skeptical of all products and I have to say this is a life changer! I can’t believe how much my eyelashes have grown in just month. I thought I would never have lashes again. Even though they’re not noticeably longer to others yet because it’s a slow process I see results! I can’t wait to keep using this for months to see the results. All the reviews were right. You cannot go wrong even on brows!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. Within a month I noticed a drastic change in my lashes and now people are always asking me if I have lash extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lavish lash!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it conditions my lashes! It’s helped my lashes grow!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients are not consistent
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients are not consistent. Every time I’ve ordered a new bottle the ingredients have change.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiMarie

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Growth
customer_reviews.text: Lavish Lash added growth and length to my lashes within 2 weeks. Have used the product for at least 6 weeks and my mascara has more to hold on to and the length is improved. Would recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Holoubek

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as apposed to a more expensive one, I am totally satisfied and very happy with the results, my eyelashes are much longer and fuller! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month. I didn't use every day but maybe a few times a week. I havent noticed a big difference in my lashes but OMG my eyebrows started growing in thicker!! I am very happy with the results!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Rebuy
customer_reviews.text: Supply lasts for months and that’s refilling for each eye nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this a week and my eyebrows are already showing signs of growth.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: is works
customer_reviews.text: I had used this product only 3 weeks and see my lash is much longer. I am very happy with this product and recommend to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Meishao Lin

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Had it 4 weeks and already seeing a difference!!
customer_reviews.author: jfed

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be working!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks to write this review to confirm my results. It is in fact working and where I had sparse thin lashes- I have noticed them filling in especially at the outer corners. I have always had long lashes but as I age they needed some help- nutriments. Can't wait to see my results after a few months. thank you for a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: DesignerE

customer_reviews.title: No difference in 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Been using daily for a month and see no differences. I’m going to continue using for one more month and will update my review if a miracle happens. See photos attached.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Working so far!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to try to regrow an area of lashes that had fallen out. Seems to be doing the trick so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Lashes are growing.
customer_reviews.text: I try to use in the evenings before bed almost every night. Have had about a month and definitely notice a difference in lash length.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Graham

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely saw a difference. It's takes a few weeks but...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great results even with inconsistent use.
customer_reviews.text: Wife is very happy with the results. She doesn’t use it as often as she should, maybe one or two times a week but still seeing great growth. Will definitely be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: JacquieO

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS! Comparable to Rodan & Fields Lash Boost, but way more affordable! I noticed results in about 2 weeks, but I began using immediately after finishing a bottle of the R&F, so probably got results more quickly. The serum is definitely working great though. My lashes are the longest they’ve ever been. Love this stuff! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Conditioning
customer_reviews.text: I have always had shorter lashes on my left because they are dry and brittle causing them to break. In just 2 weeks of using this product they are shiny and already healthier and growing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes and this is a lash product that finally does not irritate them!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Honestly works!! I was skeptical to say the least, it after using it for about 4 months I can tell that I have longer lashes for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Abha

customer_reviews.title: Long lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks and have already noticed longer lashed! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Munsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used my entire bottle and will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE lavish lash
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It took a few weeks, but then I definitely noticed a difference. My lashes are significantly longer and I get comments on them all of the time (people frequently think I'm wearing fake lashes). After I noticed the growth, I stopped using the product daily and I still have long lashes. It's also super easy-to-use - apply once daily to clean lashes is all it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Ali

customer_reviews.title: This product does not perform as stated
customer_reviews.text: Watery, not a serum. It does not work and there is barely enough to last a month using the product once a day as instructed. I did do the 5 star review for a free bottle because the one I paid for didn't work, so I do not see the point. $30 down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: DC in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NICE PRODUCTS. IT SEEMS MY LASH BECOME LONGER.WILL CONTINUE TO USE AND SEE THE RESULT.
customer_reviews.author: AHUI

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this will repurchase when empty my lashes are healthier and less fall out ! Can see them thickening not sure about length yet .
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Denison

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been religiously using this product for 17days. I have to sayI am EXTREMELY satisfied! I normally don't wear mascara, people who know me have been asking me if I started wearing mascara. I will most definitely continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra briones

customer_reviews.title: Can tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product consistently for the past 2 months & have a noticeable difference in the length of my lashes
customer_reviews.author: brandy sorrells

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work for me. I did not have any side effects. Was disappointed because the bottle fell out of the cabinet and broke at the neck of the bottle leaking out. Should be getting a free bottle soon:)
customer_reviews.author: MzFid

customer_reviews.title: My lashes got a little longer and seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: My lashes got a little longer and seems to be thicker. Hope my lashes will keep continuing to grow
customer_reviews.author: Stella Ka’uhane

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical about purchasing. However I have had growth of my lashes. I will be purchasing again as I noticed more growth on one side than the other. Happy Customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Transformer in a tube!
customer_reviews.text: I take meds that thin my eyebrows terribly and was looking for an affordable alternative to a $100 serum I'd been using for awhile-this is it!! After a little over a week, I can already see a noticeable difference in my brows-the growth is so fast. I'm excited to start using it on my lashes too!
customer_reviews.author: Cassadie Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Excited about this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no irritation! Can’t wait to see how long I can get my lashes! Great price! Wanted to try R+F but it’s so expensive so when I found this I was way excited!
customer_reviews.author: Bl8n

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I used this in conjunction with "Babe Lash" (my friend gifted me Babe Lash a week after I bought this one). I'm unsure which one has worked the best since I've been using both, but whatever the case- my lashes are crazy long. Submitting this review to get my free bottle. FYI.. your first purchase will come with an extra bottle with a 5 star review. Can't hurt to try.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Sundeen

customer_reviews.title: It’s does helps my eyelashes!
customer_reviews.text: So far i only had tried for about a month.. My eyelashes just getting thicker.However then length is not asmlong as I want yet. The product said it’s take 2 months to see the really results.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: but this one is the best. I've used Latisse and this is every bit ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous! I've used other products that are supposed to do what this does, but this one is the best. I've used Latisse and this is every bit as good...and a lot cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Raevin Percle

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Lashes have already grown in a couple weeks; this is the longest they have ever been, even without consistent applications!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is great
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for eyebrows and lashes. As I have aged my brows have never been this full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the product long enough to see any results, just got it a couple days ago, but so far I love it!! My friends use this product and it has all worked for them, and it’s amazing to see. So I’m looking forward to the results!
customer_reviews.author: Addie Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: To put it bluntly, it works. I feel like a new woman. Pregnancy has caused my eyelashes and eyebrows to thin out, but this product has helped restore them, and it's safe to use, even while expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki Basso

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I can already tell a difference! This product is worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Teri Woods

customer_reviews.title: Makes eyelashes grow!!
customer_reviews.text: My lashes are noticeably longer after 2 1/2 weeks. I use this every morning instead of night. Not sure why but that is just my routine. I am not 100% sure about brows yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Results!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first try at boosting my lashes and I am impressed after a month. And I forget to use it a few days a week. I’m excited to continue using the lavish lash! I think they look natural as well.
customer_reviews.author: broso

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain any ingredients to enhance eyelash growth
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn't contain a prostaglandin, which is the only evidence-based and approved ingredient for eyelash growth in serum form. This product therefore will not increase the length of eyelashes without a prostaglandin. Other products, such as Latisse, contain a prostaglandin, which is why it actually works. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: This product took little time to start working and filling in that pesky area of my brow that wouldn't grow. I am extremely satisfied and will be ordering again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fuller lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Lavish lash consistently for 2 months. I wanted to wait to post a review until I finished the bottle. My lashes are longer & fuller. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product for almost 3 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost 3 weeks. I can tell that my lashes are a bit longer. They are definitely getting thicker! I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Latisse
customer_reviews.text: I have used Latisse with great results in the past but the cost was getting too expensive. So I started looking for an alternative and found this product. Read the reviews and liked what I was reading. So I gave this product a try. I’ve been using for over a month now with great results and reactions whatsoever. I can’t tell the difference between using Latisse and using Lavish Lash. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl Raley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just approaching my third week of using this product once nightly and wow, it is as if things suddenly changed overnight! I had very sparse lashes before and at first the big thing I noticed was that they were finally filled in all the way across. In the last few days though I am really starting to see an improvement in the length! I will update this review in about a month to see how things have progressed but so far I'm pleased with the results. Another huge bonus is that this does not irritate my eyes in any way and they are very sensitive to products.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schott

customer_reviews.title: Lash lengthier that works!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, I showed results in 3 weeks. Wipuld highly recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Souder

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the serum so far. I have used it for a few days now and feel like I am already seeing a difference. You must be consistent in applying it to see results. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cassy

customer_reviews.title: Miracle lashes and brows
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, my mom gave me one, when my some reason I was loosein my eye lashes and when she gave me this stuff I was so amazed how fast it started working. I saw my eye lashes growing back with in a week, I couldn’t believe it. Now I bought one for my husband, his brows started thinning out. He’s going to be so surprised when he see his brows starts grow back within a week. This stuff really works I’m definitely buying more. This is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Lavish Lash
customer_reviews.text: Havent quiet used it for a month yet, so still waiting on a difference for my lashes but, ive also been using it for my eyebrows and they have gotten thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B.

customer_reviews.title: ... using this product for 3 weeks and I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 3 weeks and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ngan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been saying for 10 days and already see some progress in length
customer_reviews.author: ButterflyNova

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to apply and feels good. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Betti Page

customer_reviews.title: Dual purpose & affordable!
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable option to the expensive Rhodan and Fields products I’ve been using. Love that this product works for both eyelashes and eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Chambers

customer_reviews.title: IT ACTUALLY WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is Todd's wife who made this purchase. I'm Asian and have the typical Asian no-lash dilemma. I had serious doubts about this until a friend recommended it. After just a couple of weeks, I can actually see my eye lashes for the first time .. no joke! I've even told several friends about this. Couldn't believe it. While my lashes are still not 1" like I'd like, they are definitely a LOT longer and fuller. I would post before/after pic, but I honestly didn't think this would remotely work, so I didn't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Annabel Eyrick

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Read an article about this and thought it was worth a try because of the rave reviews. My brows are a lot thinner than when I was younger. There was a slight tingling sensation that wasn't annoying. My lashes seem longer and fuller in the roughly three weeks I've been using this. Excited about how my brows will do. Looking forward to good results!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lavish Lashes indeed
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product about 5 weeks ago and have noticed a difference in the growth of my eyelashes. Prior to purchasing this, I was applying castor oil to my lashes nightly but it was taking forever to achieve the result I desired. Also, the castor oil would always bother my eyes no matter how careful I would try to be when applying it but this product is easy to apply and doesn't irritate my eyes at all. I would definitely recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse V

customer_reviews.title: Lavish Lash works great!
customer_reviews.text: Like this lash enhancing product very much. No irritation to skin and no coloration around eyes. Easy to Use and very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. DeMers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Would recommend. Be careful about it getting into your eyes though.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me, Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Lavish Lash because I lost too many of my own lashes using fake ones. After the first month of using this product I could see my own lashes growing back fuller and thicker, much to my satisfaction! I use this once a day and it has made SUCH a difference. I truly DID NOT believe the advertising for this product, but after using it I now can see it definitely works! Also, I have sensitive eyes and this product has never irritated or burned them. I bought another one and highly recommend using this enhancer!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Grant

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this now for a couple weeks and all I can say is wow. I can't wait to see one month difference. I noticed that my eyelashes were almost touching my eyebrows so I put on a coat of mascara and compared it to a picture taken a few days before I started using it. Already told some of my friends about it. **update- 2nd picture is my 2.5 month result without mascara
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I had eyelash extensions and they did not come off well. They grew back fuller and longer. I've been using it about 4-5 times a week for 5 weeks. I will order again!!! No mascara on in either picture.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my $$.
customer_reviews.text: Used it every night routinely for over 3 months. Did not work what so ever. Would give it 0 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Rizza Carnate

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: This simply did not work for me, even though I followed the instructions exactly and went through two tubes. My eyelashes were not longer or more full. They actually seemed more brittle. I had much better results simply putting Bio-oil on my lashes and brows. Based on the label, this product does not contain anything that has been “proved” to lengthen lashes. Glad it worked for some, but I saw zero results.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Loving results so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product every night for about 3 weeks and can already see a big difference in my lashes. They are much longer on top and on the bottom, where I had almost no lashes at all they are filling in!
customer_reviews.author: DIANE MAGUIRE

customer_reviews.title: Not SAFE!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Be cautious!!!!!!!!This product made my eyes burn and itch for 2 days straight to the point where blood capillaries were showing!!!! It was veryyy scary!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I went back a re-read the reviews only to find out that it seems like a lot of the “positive reviews” were based on ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a couple of weeks and don’t know if I truly see a difference. I purchased this based on the thousands of positive reviews. However, once I received the product, I went back a re-read the reviews only to find out that it seems like a lot of the “positive reviews” were based on the incentive that customers who left positive reviews would get free products. I’m not sure if these reviews are really truthful. Looking at the ingredients, the first ingredient listed is water. I’m not sure if this is truly effective.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: Just pay more money for babe lash!
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using babe lash to use this because of the price. STUPID ME. It does not work. All my lashes fell out after using it religiously for 2 months. Started from scratch again with babe lash and within 2 weeks started seeing results. Just pay the extra money for the stuff that works. THIS PRODUCT IS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: BDep

customer_reviews.title: It's not that I now have super thick lashes without mascara
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical if this would really work, but I have to say it does. I have been using it for about 4 weeks and have noticed that the gaps I had in my lashes are filling in. It's not that I now have super thick lashes without mascara, but I no longer have to get creative when applying mascara to move the lashes to cover the gaps. I will continue to use this product. It's very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: 4Him

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I did a before and after review of this product. I feel like I had good results! Very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Carley Kemper

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY irritating to eye
customer_reviews.text: This product caused my eyelid to become inflamed after using this product for 2 days. It’s extremely irritating to the eyelid. I had to go to an opthomogist who prescribed an anti inflammatory ointment because it was that bad (5 days later and my eyelid is slowly returning back to normal). All these 5 star reviews got a free bottle for giving the 5 star review (which should not be allowed on Amazon). Moreover, I’ve come to find out that these lash serums have caused serious damage to people’s eyes and vision (!!!). There are even class action lawsuits against some makers as the risks were not clearly outlined. Google it. Use at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Takes commitment, but it really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheaper alternative to the R+F lash boost and I found exactly what I needed! It took a couple months to see results but I'm glad I stuck with it. My lashes are SIGNIFICANTLY thicker AND longer. My pictures actually don't do the product justice. With my lashes curled with mascara, I look like I have super natural lash extensions or falsies. I have gotten so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Lost eyelashes using it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I've actually LOST eyelashes using this product. You can clearly see in the pictures. I'm glad I did take pictures.. because it seems that the length had improved a bit (but who really cares about the length of there is no volume?) while eyelashes fell out 😐 I can't believe I've paid money for this.
customer_reviews.author: Olechka

customer_reviews.title: Took some time but results were amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second bottle of this and very pleased with the product. I guess I wasn't expecting much so I was surprised by the results. For me it took almost a full month before I started to really see my eyelashes get longer and fuller, but the difference is amazing. One bottle lasts me more than a month but I only used it on my eyelashes. The product is easy to use and I didn't experience any irritation whatsoever. Wish they would offer this as subscribe and save because I plan on using this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on 5 star reviews that everyone left. Then I got an email saying that if I left a 5 star review, I would receive another of this item. So, now I know why everyone left raving reviews. I decided I would too if I felt it was worth it, but I didn't notice any progress on my eyebrows and opted for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Neetu Riley

customer_reviews.title: just like water?
customer_reviews.text: This product mentioned "proprietary botanically-derived compounds" as their ingredients and did not mention what the active ingredients are. Received the product and here are the ingredients. Keep in mind the ingredients in labels are typically in order of abundance in product. Purified water- main ingredient is water. Sodium chloride - basically salt water or saline Benzalkonium chloride- a preservative/disinfecfant Citric acid- another preservative; acidifying agent Disodium phosphate- a food additive. Basically phosphorus and sodium Cellulose gum- thickening agent You decide if these ingredients will help your eyelashes grow. I've made my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Linh M

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I've been using it for a month now and I'm already seeing results. The product recommends using it consistently for at least 60 days, so I'm reallly looking forward to how great my lashes will look after the full two months. As a FYI: For those who want to use the serum for brow and lash growth (as I've been), one tube will last about a month. I'm due for a restock.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney J.

customer_reviews.title: Not irritating to eyes at all. A big plus.
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product so haven't had any results yet. But I do like that it doesn't irritate my eyes and it is so simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Suntinger

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: After using this product my eyebrows that have been over plucked have finally grown in. I am so happy about my purchase and will be purchasing again after I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow. Many of my coworkers have been using a much more expensive lash serum and I decided to do my research and try this product. It's been a few months now and my eyelashes are at least twice as long and fuller. I didn't want to write a review until I had some results (or the lack of). I get asked about them all the time and my boyfriend says it's a huge difference as well. I certainly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy-rose King

customer_reviews.title: Five star for a free bottle
customer_reviews.text: The product has helped slightly with eyelash length. Not so much with new eyelash growth. My only “issue” is actually with the company will send you a “free” bottle with a five star rating. So I wouldn’t really go off the ratings posted
customer_reviews.author: Southern Momma

customer_reviews.title: For me this product did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on Aug. 29th, 2018 and began using it right away. It is now Dec. 4th and my eye lashes and eyebrows have not grown one bit. I used it every night without fail. I am not happy at all and do not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kavin

product_meta.title: Pronexa Hairgenics Lavish Lash – Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum with Biotin & Natural Growth Peptides for Long, Thick Lashes and Eyebrows! Dermatologist Certified, Cruelty Free & Hypoallergenic.
product_meta.description:
Are you tired of short eyelashes and patchy, thin eyebrows? Do you wish that you didn’t have to pile on mascara or use false eye lashes? Forget about eyelash extensions! Get the long and luscious eyelashes you want with Lavish Lash Eyelash growth serum. The secret to longer eyelashes lies in the unique formula made with top-quality and natural ingredients including plant peptides and biotin. Get a huge Lash Boost with Lavish Lash Growth serum today!

Thanks to our cutting edge technology and years of research and clinical studies, Lavish Lash is now a reality. Once you try it for at least 2 months, it will be an irreplaceable part of your nightly beauty regimen. The active serum will make a huge improvement to the length of your lashes, their thickness and density. Lavish Lash Eyelash Serum and Conditioner will also impart sheen and luster to lashes and brows making them appear lush and beautiful.

Lavish Lash is simple and easy to apply, and is hypoallergenic and completely safe and effective. Apply to the base of your upper and lower lash line at the root every night as though applying eyeliner. You can also apply a thin line to your clean eyebrows for thicker brows. AVOID CONTACT WITH YOUR EYES!

Use for a minimum of at least 60 days as the eyelashes and brows are the slowest growing hairs on the human body, and best results can be seen after 90 days. As with all Hairgenics products, your satisfaction is guaranteed or your money back!
feature_bullets: Our revolutionary botanical serum boosts the length and thickness of eyelashes and eyebrows. The result is longer, fuller and thicker eyelashes and brows! Imparts sheen and luster to lashes and brows making them appear lush and beautiful. No more false lashes needed!

Lavish Lash is proven by science. Experience drastic increases in length and thickness of your eyelashes and eyebrows in as little as 60 days for the perfect lash boost! Contains proprietary botanically-derived compounds that penetrate hair follicles to stimulate lash and brow growth which in turn fortifies the eyelashes and brows to noticeably lengthen and thicken them.

Lavish Lash is made with only the highest quality ingredients. Everything in our serum is hypoallergenic, non-irritating, clinically tested, allergy tested & dermatologist tested. Never tested on animals.

Easy to apply. Simply place a thin line along the base of your upper and lower lash line once a day at nighttime. Apply only at the root area of eyelashes and as though applying eyeliner and onto clean eyebrows. Combine with our Lavish Liner eyeliner with eyelash growth serum and castor oil for even better results.
Use for a minimum of at least 60 days as the eyelashes and brows are the slowest growing hairs on the human body. Your satisfaction is guaranteed or your money back!
